about_the_game:
Are you ready to go on a special mission to save the kingdom? Take command of a floating barge as you are tasked with taking a mysterious briefcase across the continent in search of the island of Amkonius.

During your path you will face bandits and monsters trying to destroy the barge as you are busy trying to keep your supplies and the crew’s morale from running out.

Select crew members from among 42 different unit types to optimize the barge stats as you make your way across 25 different paths with unique stochastic events.

You have only one option, and that is to…….

Get to Amkonius!


What the game is:

Get to Amkonius is a bottom up scroller where you encounter stochastic events in turns.
You move units on and off the barge to increase stats; different stats helping with different situations.
You select from randomly generated paths with different event types.
As you progress, different paths become available to you.
The game was play tested at around 3 hours, depending on how fast you play.
